snippet.title: Bear Surfin Mega Wave (free indie game)
snippet.description:
Author's description:
"A short difficult fast paced crazy weird arcade game with hectic graphics. You are 'Bear' surfing a Mega Wave.Use the mouse to maneuver Bear around obstacles. Try to get crates and health packs. When the counter reaches zero you win. 
Music by scrogginaut.newgrounds.com"
Download: http://gamejolt.com/games/arcade/bear-surfin-mega-wave/10088/
Gameplay video by http://www.idealsoftblog.it (freeware games, indie games)
